transformations.name: DataTransformation
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SharePointSiteUrl as string,
	TempFileLocation as string,
	OpenLibraryDriveId as string,
	RestrictedLibraryDriveId as string,
	FeedbackUrl as string,
	FeedbackAuthorization as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['/metadata','metadataprocessed'],
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> dcffilesource
SetCustomFields split(startsWith(LRMUniqueFolderId, "SA."),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckDestination@(SendToRestrictedLibrary, SendToOpenLibrary)
CheckDestination@SendToRestrictedLibrary derive(driveid = $RestrictedLibraryDriveId) ~> SetRestrictedColumn
CheckDestination@SendToOpenLibrary derive(driveid = $OpenLibraryDriveId) ~> SetOpenColumn
FieldsMapping derive(DestFilename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID, '.json'),
		TempFileLocation = concat($TempFileLocation, LRMHPECMRecordID),
		Filename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID,'_', Filename),
		documentId = LRMHPECMRecordID,
		Title = Filename,
		documentIdField = 'LRMHPECMRecordID',
		feedbackAuthorization = $FeedbackAuthorization) ~> SetCustomFields
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		Filename,
		Source,
		LRMArchivedBy = {ARCHIVED USER},
		LRMAttachments = ATTACHMENTS,
		LRMBOLDate = {B/L DATE},
		LRMBroker = BROKER,
		LRMCargoNumber = {CARGO NUMBER},
		LRMCustomer = CUSTOMER,
		LRMDateExecuted = {DATE EXECUTED},
		LRMDealNumber = {DEAL NUMBER},
		LRMDischargePort = {DISCHARGE PORT},
		LRMHPECMRecordID = documentId,
		LRMFolderType = {FOLDER TYPE},
		LRMLoadPort = {LOAD PORT},
		LRMQuality = QUALITY,
		LRMResponsibleOperator = {RESPONSIBLE OPS},
		LRMTo = TO,
		LRMTransmissionDate = {TRANSMISSION DATE},
		LRMUniqueFolderId = {UNIQUE FOLDER ID},
		LRMVessel = VESSEL,
		LRMVoyageNumber = {VOYAGE NUMBER},
		usecsom,
		feedbackurl
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FieldsMapping
dcffilesource derive({ARCHIVED USER} = toString(byName('ARCHIVED USER')),
		ATTACHMENTS = toString(byName('ATTACHMENTS')),
		{B/L DATE} = toString(byName('B/L DATE')),
		BROKER = toString(byName('BROKER')),
		{CARGO NUMBER} = toString(byName('CARGO NUMBER')),
		CUSTOMER = toString(byName('CUSTOMER')),
		{DATE EXECUTED} = toString(byName('DATE EXECUTED')),
		{DEAL NUMBER} = toString(byName('DEAL NUMBER')),
		{DISCHARGE PORT} = toString(byName('DISCHARGE PORT')),
		{FOLDER TYPE} = toString(byName('FOLDER TYPE')),
		Filename = toString(byName('Filename')),
		{LOAD PORT} = toString(byName('LOAD PORT')),
		QUALITY = toString(byName('QUALITY')),
		{RESPONSIBLE OPS} = toString(byName('RESPONSIBLE OPS')),
		Source = toString(byName('Source')),
		TO = toString(byName('TO')),
		{TRANSMISSION DATE} = toString(byName('TRANSMISSION DATE')),
		{UNIQUE FOLDER ID} = toString(byName('UNIQUE FOLDER ID')),
		VESSEL = toString(byName('VESSEL')),
		{VOYAGE NUMBER} = toString(byName('VOYAGE NUMBER')),
		documentId = toString(byName('documentId')),
		title = toString(byName('title')),
		usecsom = false(),
		feedbackurl = $FeedbackUrl) ~> DataTransformation
SetRestrictedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FileDestinationOpen
SetOpenColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FileDestinationRestricted

transformations.name: DataTransformation
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SharePointSiteUrl as string,
	TempFileLocation as string,
	OpenLibraryDriveId as string,
	RestrictedLibraryDriveId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	purgeFiles: true,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> dcffilesource
SetFileName split(startsWith(LRMUniqueFolderId, "SA."),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckDestination@(SendToRestrictedLibrary, SendToOpenLibrary)
CheckDestination@SendToRestrictedLibrary derive(driveid = $RestrictedLibraryDriveId) ~> SetRestrictedColumn
CheckDestination@SendToOpenLibrary derive(driveid = $OpenLibraryDriveId) ~> SetOpenColumn
FieldsMapping derive(DestFilename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID, '.json'),
		TempFileLocation = concat($TempFileLocation, LRMHPECMRecordID),
		Filename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID,'_', Filename),
		documentId = LRMHPECMRecordID,
		Title = Filename,
		documentIdField = 'LRMHPECMRecordID') ~> SetFileName
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		Filename,
		Source,
		LRMArchivedBy = {ARCHIVED USER},
		LRMAttachments = ATTACHMENTS,
		LRMBOLDate = {B/L DATE},
		LRMBroker = BROKER,
		LRMCargoNumber = {CARGO NUMBER},
		LRMCustomer = CUSTOMER,
		LRMDateExecuted = {DATE EXECUTED},
		LRMDealNumber = {DEAL NUMBER},
		LRMDischargePort = {DISCHARGE PORT},
		LRMHPECMRecordID = documentId,
		LRMFolderType = {FOLDER TYPE},
		LRMLoadPort = {LOAD PORT},
		LRMQuality = QUALITY,
		LRMResponsibleOperator = {RESPONSIBLE OPS},
		LRMTo = TO,
		LRMTransmissionDate = {TRANSMISSION DATE},
		LRMUniqueFolderId = {UNIQUE FOLDER ID},
		LRMVessel = VESSEL,
		LRMVoyageNumber = {VOYAGE NUMBER},
		usecsom,
		feedbackurl
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FieldsMapping
dcffilesource derive({ARCHIVED USER} = toString(byName('ARCHIVED USER')),
		ATTACHMENTS = toString(byName('ATTACHMENTS')),
		{B/L DATE} = toString(byName('B/L DATE')),
		BROKER = toString(byName('BROKER')),
		{CARGO NUMBER} = toString(byName('CARGO NUMBER')),
		CUSTOMER = toString(byName('CUSTOMER')),
		{DATE EXECUTED} = toString(byName('DATE EXECUTED')),
		{DEAL NUMBER} = toString(byName('DEAL NUMBER')),
		{DISCHARGE PORT} = toString(byName('DISCHARGE PORT')),
		{FOLDER TYPE} = toString(byName('FOLDER TYPE')),
		Filename = toString(byName('Filename')),
		{LOAD PORT} = toString(byName('LOAD PORT')),
		QUALITY = toString(byName('QUALITY')),
		{RESPONSIBLE OPS} = toString(byName('RESPONSIBLE OPS')),
		Source = toString(byName('Source')),
		TO = toString(byName('TO')),
		{TRANSMISSION DATE} = toString(byName('TRANSMISSION DATE')),
		{UNIQUE FOLDER ID} = toString(byName('UNIQUE FOLDER ID')),
		VESSEL = toString(byName('VESSEL')),
		{VOYAGE NUMBER} = toString(byName('VOYAGE NUMBER')),
		documentId = toString(byName('documentId')),
		title = toString(byName('title')),
		usecsom = false(),
		feedbackurl = "https://tops-dcf-sharepoint.azurewebsites.net/api/test/drive?code=H64RWZuOiq2nZLluc2daNe8cKxsOp/WhcG8azWWnx/xR4ANitl9EQQ==") ~> DataTransformation
SetRestrictedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FileDestinationOpen
SetOpenColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FileDestinationRestricted

transformations.name: DynamicFetchData
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SharePointSiteUrl as string,
	TempFileLocation as string,
	LibraryId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['/metadata','metadataprocessed'],
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> edibankfilesource
SharePointFieldMappings derive(each(match(instr(name,'date')>0), $$ = toString(toDate(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		TempFileLocation = concat($TempFileLocation, LRMHPECMRecordID),
		DestFilename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID, '.json'),
		Filename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID,'_',Filename),
		driveid = $LibraryId,
		Title = Filename,
		documentIdField = 'LRMHPECMRecordID',
		documentId = LRMHPECMRecordID) ~> DataTransformation
edibankfilesource derive(Filename = toString(byName('Filename')),
		Source = toString(byName('Source')),
		businesspartner = toString(byName('businesspartner')),
		documentId = toString(byName('documentId')),
		documenttype = toString(byName('documenttype')),
		externalreference = toString(byName('externalreference')),
		fileid = toString(byName('fileid')),
		linkedreference = toString(byName('linkedreference')),
		recipientscompany = toString(byName('recipientscompany')),
		signaturekey = toString(byName('signaturekey')),
		technicaldocumenttype = toString(byName('technicaldocumenttype')),
		transmissiondate = toString(byName('transmissiondate')),
		transportsystem = toString(byName('transportsystem'))) ~> DynamicFetchData
DynamicFetchData select(mapColumn(
		Filename,
		Source,
		LRMBusinessPartner = businesspartner,
		LRMHPECMRecordID = documentId,
		LRMDocumentType = documenttype,
		LRMExternalReference = externalreference,
		LRMFileId = fileid,
		LRMLinkedReference = linkedreference,
		LRMRecipientCompany = recipientscompany,
		LRMSignatureKey = signaturekey,
		LRMTechDocType = technicaldocumenttype,
		LRMTransmissionDate = transmissiondate,
		LRMTransportSystem = transportsystem
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SharePointFieldMappings
DataTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> edibankfiledestination

transformations.name: DynamicFetchData
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SharePointSiteUrl as string,
	TempFileLocation as string,
	LibraryId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['/metadata','metadataprocessed'],
	rowUrlColumn: 'TempDataFile',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> gasopsfilesource
SharePointFieldMapping derive(each(match(instr(name,'date')>0), $$ = toString(toDate(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		driveid = $LibraryId,
		TempFileLocation = concat($TempFileLocation, LRMHPECMRecordID),
		DestFilename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID, '.json'),
		Filename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID,'_',Filename),
		Title = Filename,
		usecsom = false(),
		documentIdField = 'LRMHPECMRecordID') ~> DataTransformation
gasopsfilesource derive(Filename = toString(byName('Filename')),
		Source = toString(byName('Source')),
		direction = toString(byName('direction')),
		documentId = toString(byName('documentId')),
		loggerId = toString(byName('loggerId')),
		partner = toString(byName('partner')),
		publisheddate = toString(byName('publisheddate'))) ~> DynamicFetchData
DynamicFetchData select(mapColumn(
		Filename,
		Source,
		LRMMessageDirection = direction,
		LRMHPECMRecordID = documentId,
		LRMLoggerId = loggerId,
		LRMPartner = partner,
		LRMPublished = publisheddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SharePointFieldMapping
DataTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> gasopsfiledestination

transformations.name: DynamicFetchData
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SharePointSiteUrl as string,
	TempFileLocation as string,
	LibraryId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['/metadata','metadataprocessed'],
	rowUrlColumn: 'TempDataFile',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> gomfilesource
SharePointFieldMapping derive(each(match(instr(name,'date')>0), $$ = toString(toDate(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		driveid = $LibraryId,
		TempFileLocation = concat($TempFileLocation, LRMHPECMRecordID),
		DestFilename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID, '.json'),
		Filename = concat(LRMHPECMRecordID,'_',Filename),
		Title = Filename,
		usecsom = false(),
		documentIdField = 'LRMHPECMRecordID') ~> DataTransformation
gomfilesource derive(Filename = toString(byName('Filename')),
		Source = toString(byName('Source')),
		gom_document_id = toString(byName('gom_document_id')),
		gom_document_number = toString(byName('gom_document_number')),
		gom_document_name = toString(byName('gom_document_name')),
		gom_origunal_file_name = toString(byName('gom_origunal_file_name')),
		gom_issue_date = toString(byName('gom_issue_date')),
		gom_issued_by = toString(byName('gom_issued_by')),
		gom_commodity_type = toString(byName('gom_commodity_type')),
		gom_activity_start_date = toString(byName('gom_activity_start_date')),
		gom_activity_end_date = toString(byName('gom_activity_end_date')),
		documentId = toString(byName('documentId'))) ~> DynamicFetchData
DynamicFetchData select(mapColumn(
		Filename,
		Source,
		LRMMessageDirection = gom_document_id,
		LRMLoggerId = gom_document_name,
		LRMPartner = gom_origunal_file_name,
		LRMPublished = gom_issue_date,
		LRMHPECMRecordID = documentId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SharePointFieldMapping
DataTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DestFilename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> gomfiledestination
